Reviews.Title: “Its exactly what my rating says, VERY AVERAGE!”
Reviews.Author: josephcj
Reviews.Content: hotel located close mall emirates scores location look hotel outside theres absolutely excited lobby average service overall poor restaurant lobby sometimes lobby smells serve highly aromatic food indian thats nice walk theres indian restaurant ground floor due poor air ventilation system bearing smell indian food mean im india trust indian restaurant home else ive breakfast served restaurant indian indian breakfast al guess whos prefer continental breakfast arent choose clean rest hotel mini bar refrigerator coffee maker didnt iron call wasnt quality bathroom clean reasonably sized bath tub complain booking company hence cheap deal price paid otherwise charge aed 450 double occupancy nearly 50 price overall id recommend unless stay close mall emirates cheap conclusion location clean service

Reviews.Title: “Grandeur is a big word for a poor hotel”
Reviews.Author: TC_On_Tour
Reviews.Content: ill honest beginning clean comfortable people thats hotels little inconveniences 3 star hotel positive review kick inconsistent hot water hotels cardinal sin break particularly annoying bathroom clean contemporary smart nonexistent excellent internet free regrettably travelling free internet massive neon sign suggesting hotel decidedly average particularly unhelpful smiley staff rang reception nokia charger hotels million straight response “no” suggests bloke answering phone absolutely care replacement tea coffee nice touch sports bar bit dingy distinct lack broadcast sports thats world ramada hotel door excellent sports bar grandeur look especially ropey overall grandeur average hotel annoyingly focused little bit service wrong hotel bad choice pay extra quid stay bit established ramada hotel door example

Reviews.Title: “value for money”

Reviews.Content: stayed 4 days price reasonable spacious fit infant bed couch queen size bed 15km mall emirates walking summer difficult winter fine thers nice restaurant night club ground flr noisy disturb kidsthe staff friendly kept clean try restaurant booked parties times overall enjoyed stay
